'''v0.10.1 alpha''' is a minor update to ''[[Pocket Edition|Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' released on November 19, 2014 for Android only, to fix some bugs in [[Pocket Edition v0.10.0 alpha|v0.10.0]].

== Fixes ==
* Fixes some bugs and crashes.
* Fixed a crash when loading corrupted chunks.</onlyinclude>
